abstract: The businesses, which are being sold as General Electric moves away from banking, have a book value of about $1.8 billion.
snippet: The businesses, which are being sold as General Electric moves away from banking, have a book value of about $1.8 billion.
lead_paragraph: SYDNEY, Australia — GE Capital has three final participants in the final round of an auction of its Australian commercial lending and leasing businesses, said a person with direct knowledge of the matter.

headline.main: GE Capital’s Australian Units Said to Be Receiving Final Bids From 3
